emeScheme.names: Experiment, Species, Treatment, Measurement, DataExtraction, DataFile

ExperimentList.unit: NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, ml, NA, g/l, NA, NA
ExperimentList.type: character, character, character, character, character, character, numeric, character, numeric, character, character
ExperimentList.allowedValues: NA, treatment, ..., treatment, ..., treatment, ..., none, bench, ..., NA, NA, NA, NA, axenic, dirty, clean, …, treatment, single trophic level, multiple trophic level, …
ExperimentList.names: name, temperature, light, humidity, incubator, container, microcosmVolume, mediaType, mediaConcentration, cultureConditions, comunityType
ExperimentList.class: emeSchemeData_Experiment, emeSchemeData, emeScheme, tbl_df, tbl, data.frame

SpeciesList.unit: NA, NA, NA, NA, cells / ml, NA
SpeciesList.type: character, character, character, character, numeric, character
SpeciesList.allowedValues: NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, bacteria, bacteriavore, predator, phototroph, …
SpeciesList.names: name, strain, source, comment, density, functionalGroup
SpeciesList.class: emeSchemeData_Species, emeSchemeData, emeScheme, tbl_df, tbl, data.frame

TreatmentList.unit: NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA
TreatmentList.type: character, character, character, character, character, character
TreatmentList.allowedValues: NA, temp, light, initial density, comunity composition, densities, dispersal, viscosity, disturbance, communityType, species, …}, C, lux, name, ..., value, variable: freetext, ..., NA, NA
TreatmentList.names: name, parameter, unit, treatmentLevel, comment, datafile
TreatmentList.class: emeSchemeData_Treatment, emeSchemeData, emeScheme, tbl_df, tbl, data.frame

MeasurementList.unit: NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, days between sampling, ml, days, NA, NA, NA
MeasurementList.type: character, character, character, character, character, character, integer, numeric, numeric, integer, character, character, character
MeasurementList.allowedValues: NA, O2 concentration, video, manual count, …, presens Optode, microscopy, …, %, mmol, count, …, species, OUT, gene, community, …, NA, NA, NA, NA, NA, raw, bemovi, ..., NA, NA
MeasurementList.names: name, variable, method, unit, object, comments, noOfSamplesInTimeSeries, samplingAverageFrequency, samplingVolume, lengthOfTimeSeries, dataExtractionMethod, rawDataFile, datafile
MeasurementList.class: emeSchemeData_Measurement, emeSchemeData, emeScheme, tbl_df, tbl, data.frame

DataExtractionList.allowedValues: NA, bemovi x.y.z, ..., NA, NA, NA
DataExtractionList.class: emeSchemeData_DataExtraction, emeSchemeData, emeScheme, tbl_df, tbl, data.frame

DataFileList.allowedValues: NA, coldlight, hot, highdens, video_lf, o2_hf, mc, os_lf, video_hf, bemovi_1, bemovi_2, raw, NA
DataFileList.class: emeSchemeData_DataFile, emeSchemeData, emeScheme, tbl_df, tbl, data.frame
